<style>
  .product-price-points-container {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 8px 12px;
  }
  .product-block-group--price {
    flex: 1 1 100%;
  }
.m-points-display {
    flex: 1 1 100%;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 14px;
    white-space: nowrap;
    flex-direction: row;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
}
  .m-points-icon {
    display: inline-flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    background-color: rgb(var(--color-price-sale));
    color: white;
    border-radius: 50%;
    width: 24px;
    height: 24px;
    margin: 0 4px;
    flex-shrink: 0;
  }
  .points-value {
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 12px;
  }
  .m-points-learn-more {
    color: rgb(var(--color-price-sale));
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: normal;
  }

  @media (min-width: 768px) {
    .product-price-points-container {
      flex-wrap: nowrap;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    .product-block-group--price {
      flex: 0 1 auto;
    }
    .m-points-display {
      flex: 0 1 auto;
      overflow: hidden;
      text-overflow: ellipsis;
    }
  }


  @media (min-width: 768px) {
    .product-block-group--price .m-points-text {
      margin-left: 0px;
    }
  }

  @media (max-width: 767px) {
    .main-product__block .product-block-group--price .m-price {
      font-size: 30px;
      width: 100%;
    }
    
    .product-block-group--price {
      display: flex;
      flex-direction: column;
    }
    
    .product-block-group--price .m-points-display {
      margin-top: 8px;
      width: 100%;
    }
  }
</style>

settings.deliver_text: Order in the next  to get it by  -  UK Only
settings.shipping_title: Free Tracked Delivery for orders over £30
settings.price_match_title: Found a better price? We’ll beat it!
settings.popup_description:
Price Match Guarantee

We won't be beaten on price! We'll match or beat any reputable UK online store. Conditions apply:

  • Same product, in stock for same-day dispatch.
  • Includes postage & packaging.
  • Advertised price must be public and not clearance or special promotion.

Questions? Contact our customer support via live chat or fill in the form below.

settings.heading: Get notified when this is back in stock
settings.label_success: Thanks! You will be notified once the product is back in stock.

settings.custom_liquid:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    function isBST(date) {
      const year = date.getFullYear();
      const startBST = new Date(Date.UTC(year, 2, 31 - (new Date(year, 2, 31).getDay() + 1) % 7, 1));
      const endBST = new Date(Date.UTC(year, 9, 31 - (new Date(year, 9, 31).getDay() + 1) % 7, 1));
      return date >= startBST && date < endBST;
    }

    function updateCountdown() {
      const now = new Date();
      const isUKBST = isBST(now);
      const ukTimeOffset = isUKBST ? 1 : 0; // UTC+1 for BST, UTC+0 for GMT
      const ukTime = new Date(now.getTime() + (now.getTimezoneOffset() * 60000) + (ukTimeOffset * 3600000));
      
      const targetHour = 16; // 4 PM UK time
      let targetDate = new Date(ukTime);
      const currentDay = ukTime.getDay();
      
      // Set the target date based on the current day
      if (currentDay >= 1 && currentDay <= 4) { // Monday to Thursday
        targetDate.setHours(targetHour, 0, 0, 0);
        if (ukTime.getHours() >= targetHour) {
          targetDate.setDate(targetDate.getDate() + 1);
        }
      } else if (currentDay === 5) { // Friday
        targetDate.setHours(targetHour, 0, 0, 0);
        if (ukTime.getHours() >= targetHour) {
          targetDate.setDate(targetDate.getDate() + 3); // Move to Monday
        }
      } else { // Saturday and Sunday
        targetDate.setDate(targetDate.getDate() + ((1 - currentDay + 7) % 7)); // Move to next Monday
        targetDate.setHours(targetHour, 0, 0, 0);
      }

      // Calculate arrival date
      let arrivalDate = new Date(targetDate);
      arrivalDate.setDate(arrivalDate.getDate() + 1);
      if (arrivalDate.getDay() === 0) { // Sunday
        arrivalDate.setDate(arrivalDate.getDate() + 1); // Set to Monday
      } else if (arrivalDate.getDay() === 6) { // Saturday
        arrivalDate.setDate(arrivalDate.getDate() + 2); // Set to Monday
      }

      const arrivalDay = arrivalDate.toLocaleDateString('en-GB', { weekday: 'long' });
      const arrivalDateFormatted = arrivalDate.toLocaleDateString('en-GB', { day: 'numeric', month: 'long' });
      document.getElementById("arrival-date").innerHTML = `${arrivalDay}, ${arrivalDateFormatted}`;

      const timeDifference = targetDate - ukTime;
      const days = Math.floor(timeDifference / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24));
      const hours = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60));
      const minutes = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60));
      const seconds = Math.floor((timeDifference % (1000 * 60)) / 1000);

      let countdownText = "";
      if (days > 0) {
        countdownText += `${days}d ${hours}h ${minutes}m`;
      } else if (hours > 0) {
        countdownText += `${hours}h ${minutes}m`;
      } else if (minutes > 0) {
        countdownText += `${minutes}m ${seconds}s`;
      } else {
        countdownText += `${seconds}s`;
      }

      document.getElementById("countdown-timer").innerHTML = countdownText.trim();
      setTimeout(updateCountdown, 1000);
    }

    updateCountdown();
  });
</script>

START RETURN APPLICATION NOW

Royal Mail Tracked 24

£2.99 under £30 / £2.49 over £30 / Free Above £60

  • 1-3 working days.
  • Tracked to delivery point.
  • Same day dispatch Monday to Friday orders placed before 4.00pm. (Excluding Bank holidays).
  • Deliveries are made weekdays and on Saturday.

Royal Mail Tracked 48

£1.99 under £30 / Free Above £30

  • 2-5 working days.
  • Tracked to delivery point.
  • Same day dispatch Monday to Friday orders placed before 4.00pm. (Excluding Bank holidays).
  • Deliveries are made weekdays and on Saturday.

DPD Next Working Day Main Land

£4.49 under £30 / £3.99 over £30 / Free Above £60

  • 1 HOUR TIME SLOT.
  • Next working day.
  • UK Mainland.
  • Deliveries made Monday to Friday (excl. Weekends & Bank Holidays).
  • Fully tracked service.

DPD Saturday

£8.49 under £40 / £7.99 over £40 / £5.99 Above £60

  • 1 HOUR TIME SLOT.
  • Next working day.
  • UK Mainland.
  • Deliveries need to be made by Friday 4 PM (If an order is placed after this time it will be sent the following Monday via DPD Next Day Service and you will be reimbursed the difference.)
  • Fully tracked service

UPS International

Calculated At Checkout

  • Delivery times depend on the country.
  • Same day dispatch Monday-Friday on orders placed before 4 pm (excluding bank holidays).
  • Fully tracked service.
  • Deliveries made Monday to Friday (excl. Weekends & Bank Holidays).
  • Import duty & fees upon arrival of your parcel. We have removed the VAT from international purchases, so you are not charged twice!

International Shipping

Calculated At Checkout

  • Shipping Rates are calculated at checkout for your specific country.
  • Options - Royal Mail, DPD and UPS.
  • Fully tracked service.
  • Import duty & fees upon arrival of your parcel. We have removed the VAT from international purchases, so you are not charged twice!
  • International parcel refunds / claims cannot be processed until 28 days have passed without scan or delivery.
  • Customs rejection/refusal is at the risk of the receiver. Ecigone will not be liable for detained or destroyed goods.

Our Price Promise

At Ecigone, we are committed to offering you the best prices available. If you find a lower price from another retailer, we promise to match it. Shop with confidence knowing you are getting the best deal.

How it works:

  1. Find a lower price from another online retailer.
  2. Click the button below and fill out the price match form and wait for approval.
  3. Once checked and verified we’ll then generate you a discount code to match the price.
Found a better price?
